spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-Configuration
spec_data.Description:
This module lets you define attributes which can come from a configuration
file. It also adds a role to your class which allows you to write a
configuration file.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:59:13 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Define attributes which come from configuration files
